message:
Testing Anomaly Alerts for Unacked Message Count

@omar@joinhandshake.com
name: [DEP-TEST] Anomaly Unacked Message Count for DEP Subscriptions
query: avg(last_1d):anomalies(min:gcp.pubsub.subscription.num_unacked_messages_by_region{subscription_id:hsn*} by {project_id,subscription_id}, 'robust', 5, direction='above', interval=300, alert_window='last_1h', count_default_zero='true', seasonality='daily') >= 1
